snippet: Liu Zhijun, who was removed from his post in 2011, has been reviled by state-run media and Chinese bloggers since a deadly train crash.
lead_paragraph: Liu Zhijun, who was removed from his post in 2011, has been reviled by state-run media and Chinese bloggers since a deadly train crash.

headline.seo: Liu Zhijun, Former Chinese Rail Minister, Is Charged With Corruption
headline.main: China’s Former Rail Minister Is Charged With Corruption
headline.print_headline: China’s Former Rail Minister Is Charged With Corruption
